text: Iga Świątek was the defending champion, but chose not to participate. Olga Danilović won the title, defeating Julia Grabher in the final, 6–2, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw Montreux Ladies Open - Singles
title: 2019 Montreux Ladies Open – Singles
